    class SomeClass() {
private:
    static int staticNum;
public:
    SomeClass() {};
    ~SomeClass();
    int sum(int n1, int n2) {
        return n1 + n2;
    }
};
int SomeClass::staticNum = 0;

int main(void?) {
    int a = 1;
    int b = 2;
    char* str = "abcd";
    int c = sum(a, b);

    std::cout << c;
    return 0;
}
